paragraphs.text: The first thought that came to my mind was how well documented, polished and presented Superalgos is.  Considering the shear amount of knowledge to be conveied to a new user, the tutorials move at a the right pace as to not overwhelm.

Having written my own basic trading interface and bots using python, I look forward to not having to worry about software edge cases or outcomes I hadn't considered.  Only through the work of a focussed community team can these issues be effectivly solved.
Wish I'd found this earlier. Can't wait to dig in.
